semantic_title: Outcome of Delivery Code Assignment Requirements
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 15. Chapter 15: Pregnancy, Childbirth, and the Puerperium > b. Selection of OB Principal or First-listed Diagnosis > 5) Outcome of delivery

content.full_text: A code from category Z37, Outcome of delivery, should be included on every maternal record when a delivery has occurred. These codes are not to be used on subsequent records or on the newborn record. (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68-L69)
content.summary: Requirements for assigning outcome of delivery codes on maternal records (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68-L69)
key_concepts: Z37 category requirement (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68)
Every delivery record inclusion (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68)
Maternal record only usage (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)
Exclusion from subsequent records (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Include Z37 code on every maternal delivery record (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68)
detailed_rules.explanation: Every maternal record where delivery occurred must include an outcome of delivery code from category Z37 (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Do not use Z37 codes on subsequent records (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)
detailed_rules.explanation: Outcome of delivery codes are only used on the delivery encounter record, not follow-up visits (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Do not use Z37 codes on newborn records (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)
detailed_rules.explanation: Outcome of delivery codes are maternal codes only, never used on newborn records (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Confirm delivery occurred during encounter
Step 2: Select appropriate Z37 code based on delivery outcome
Step 3: Include as additional diagnosis on maternal record only
Step 4: Do not use on subsequent visits or newborn records

code_ranges.description: Outcome of delivery codes (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68)
code_ranges.requirement: Required on every maternal delivery record
usage_rules: Use only on delivery encounter (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68)
Not for subsequent records (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)
Not for newborn records (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)

specific_codes.context: Most common outcome code for single deliveries

code_patterns.description: Outcome of delivery pattern (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68)
code_patterns.explanation: Single character extension indicates specific delivery outcome

coding_scenarios.scenario: Normal vaginal delivery of single live infant
coding_scenarios.documentation_example: Patient delivered single live male infant vaginally at 39 weeks gestation
step_by_step: Step 2: Determine outcome as single live birth
Step 3: Assign Z37.0 as additional diagnosis on maternal record

correct_coding.rationale: Every delivery requires outcome code on maternal record (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68)

incorrect_coding.rationale: Missing required outcome of delivery code
incorrect_coding.common_mistake: Forgetting to include Z37 code on delivery records

coding_scenarios.documentation_example: Patient returns for routine 6-week postpartum visit, doing well
step_by_step: Step 1: Identify as subsequent postpartum visit
Step 2: Do not use Z37 code for follow-up visit
Step 3: Use appropriate postpartum visit code

correct_coding.rationale: Z37 codes not used on subsequent records after delivery (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)

incorrect_coding.rationale: Should not use outcome code on subsequent visits
incorrect_coding.common_mistake: Using Z37 codes on postpartum follow-up visits

warnings: Never use Z37 codes on newborn records (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)
Do not use Z37 codes on subsequent maternal visits (Evidence: pg no: 65, L69)
best_practices: Always include Z37 code when delivery occurs (Evidence: pg no: 65, L68)
Select specific Z37 code based on delivery outcome
Use only on the delivery encounter record
common_mistakes: Forgetting to include Z37 code on delivery records
Using Z37 codes on postpartum visits
Using Z37 codes on newborn records
tips: Z37 codes are mandatory for all delivery encounters
Check delivery outcome to select correct Z37 code
implementation_notes: Required for all delivery encounters regardless of complications
